page.title: 16SUPERNATURAL (CONT)
page.content: More recently a lorry driver on a routine run through [REDACTED] fell asleep at the wheel and smashed into the side of [REDACTED]. The driver was killed but his passenger (also asleep) survived. Since then people in the area claim to have seen the drivers ghost walking down the middle of the road at night. The damage done to [REDACTED] was soon repaired and it can no longer be detected. A rock band who used [REDACTED] for practicing claim to have seen the hanged man's ghost.
